customer_name: Parker Exotic Pets L L C
site_name: Parker Exotic Pets L L C

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15am on
11/18/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by ringing the doorbell, calling home and cell numbers and
leaving messages, and sending an email. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15am on 
11/18/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by ringing the doorbell, calling home and cell numbers and 
leaving messages, and sending an email. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a 
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
